game_description: Welcome to the MasterRunners Page. This is a game where you move with your hands and complete obstacles in virtual reality! MasterRunners is currently in early development, but has lots of plans for the future. Make friends in game, complete obstacles, and be sure to have fun to show you are a Master Runner.
review_1: The main reason this game is so good is because of the music, the music is made so exceptionally well made that it makes me burst everytime I hear it. This review is not biased, I'm not a sound designer and moderator, I'm not being held at gun point rn. Play the game, please. Also the game made me bust ong frfr 💸💸💸💸🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🗣️🗣️🗣️🗣️🗣️🗣️‼️‼️‼️
review_2: Master runners is very creative and fun when it comes to how the game is made and it is definitely one of the best gtag fan games I have played! I definitely recommend it to anyone who has not played it yet.
review_3: its a pretty decent game has lots of gamemodes with an og map which gives nostalgia and 3 levels of horror which imo are actually good and scary you should give this game a try!!
review_4: I lost my og badge and I never deleted the game nor did a factory reset yet when I logged on the new update i had all of my cosmetics. I then went to the discord to ask if I could get it back because I had footage of me buying it and he didn’t help me at all just trying to ignore the conversation
review_5: I just shot and killed a child and this game helped me cope
